name: Mine Games (Evan Rawl)
description:
I created this short game as part of a concept for a larger experience, our assignment was to design a game around a certain emotion and I went with fear, anxiety and so on. This was a fun first time at creating a game with this type of atmosphere, I hope to get the chance to create something much more impactful in the near future.

Assets used:

Purple Crystal Mine - Astire Games

Textures from CGTextures.com
